title: ULTIMATE BRAVERY WON

replies.body: ultimate fucking bravery, for every troll who lacks an imagination

Seems like you did poorly and didn't really contribute to the team. Out of 61/64 k/d for your team, you were only assisting 4 kills, and died 8 times. This entire concept doesn't really mesh well with the concept of a team game like LoL.
